5a13876f8bf55085c847fd2a.description: Amumu's attacks reduce the target's Magic Resistance for a short duration.
5a13876f8bf55085c847fd2a.name: Cursed Touch

5a13876f8bf55085c847fd26.description: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself and the nearest ally champion.
5a13876f8bf55085c847fd26.name: Triumphant Roar

5a13876f8bf55085c847fd27.description: Nunu can cast a spell for free after 5 attacks.
5a13876f8bf55085c847fd27.name: Visionary

5a1386178bf55085c847d3c7.description: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.
5a1386178bf55085c847d3c7.name: Shunpo
5a1386178bf55085c847d3c7.tooltip:
Katarina dashes in the blink of an eye to the target ally, enemy, or Dagger. If it is an enemy, Katarina strikes for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage - otherwise she strikes the nearest enemy in range.

Picking up a Dagger will reduce Shunpo's cooldown by {{ f1 }} seconds ({{ f3*100 }}%).

16

5a13861b8bf55085c847d3fb.description: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, damaging them and rendering them unable to attack or move.
5a13861b8bf55085c847d3fb.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
5a13861b8bf55085c847d3fb.tooltip: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and preventing attacks and movement for 2 seconds.

5a1386178bf55085c847d3c6.description: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.
5a1386178bf55085c847d3c6.name: Flame Chompers!
5a1386178bf55085c847d3c6.tooltip: Jinx tosses out 3 chompers that, once armed, explode on contact with enemy champions, rooting the target for 1.5 seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage over 1.5 seconds to nearby enemies. Chompers last for 5 seconds.

5a1386198bf55085c847d3da.description: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.
5a1386198bf55085c847d3da.name: The Equalizer
5a1386198bf55085c847d3da.tooltip:
Rumble launches a line of rockets that creates a burning trail for 5 seconds. Enemies in the area have their Movement Speed slowed by {{ e3 }}% and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second.

You can control the placement of this attack by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.

5a1386198bf55085c847d3db.description: Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit colision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them.
5a1386198bf55085c847d3db.name: Trample
5a1386198bf55085c847d3db.tooltip:
Alistar tramples the ground, ignoring unit collision and dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds to nearby enemies. Each pulse that damages at least one enemy champion grants Alistar a Trample stack.

At {{ e5 }} Trample stacks Alistar empowers his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal an additional {{ f3 }} magic damage and stun for {{ e6 }} second.

5a1386198bf55085c847d3d8.description: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.
5a1386198bf55085c847d3d8.name: Scrap Shield
5a1386198bf55085c847d3d8.tooltip:
Rumble tosses up a shield for 2 seconds that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Rumble also gains an additional {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for 1 second.

Danger Zone Bonus: 50% increase in shield health and Movement Speed.

5a1386178bf55085c847d3c8.description: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.
5a1386178bf55085c847d3c8.name: Noxian Diplomacy
5a1386178bf55085c847d3c8.tooltip:
Talon leaps to target and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. If cast from melee range, Talon does not leap but instead critically strikes, dealing {{ f2 }}% damage ({{ f3 }}).

When Noxian Diplomacy kills a unit, Talon regains {{ f4 }} health and refunds {{ e5 }}% of its cooldown.

5a13861b8bf55085c847d3f9.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second.
5a13861b8bf55085c847d3f9.name: Despair
5a13861b8bf55085c847d3f9.tooltip: Toggle: Nearby enemies take {{ e2 }} magic damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their maximum Health each second.

5a1386198bf55085c847d3dc.description: Volibear erupts with chain lightning, damaging a number nearby enemies. The power of the storm causes Volibear's attacks to blast his targets with lightning that bounces to other nearby enemies.
5a1386198bf55085c847d3dc.name: Thunder Claws
5a1386198bf55085c847d3dc.tooltip:
Volibear erupts with chain lightning, striking up to 4 nearby enemies with {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, the storm empowers Volibear, causing his basic attacks to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage that chains to {{ e4 }} nearby enemies.

5a1386198bf55085c847d3d7.description: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.
5a1386198bf55085c847d3d7.name: Flamespitter
5a1386198bf55085c847d3d7.tooltip:
Rumble torches his opponents, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a cone over 3 seconds.

Danger Zone Bonus: Deals {{ e5 }}% damage.

5a1386188bf55085c847d3d2.description: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Daisy will send out a shockwave if she attacks the same champion three times in a row.
5a1386188bf55085c847d3d2.name: Daisy!
5a1386188bf55085c847d3d2.tooltip:
Ivern summons his sentinel friend Daisy. If Daisy attacks the same champion three times in a row, she will create a shockwave knocking enemies up for 1 second (3s cooldown). Daisy gains additional damage and defenses based on Ivern's Ability Power.

Recasting this ability will direct Daisy to a new target or position.

5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e5.description: Pantheon leaps at an enemy and bashes them with his shield, stunning them. After finishing the attack, Pantheon readies himself to block the next attack.
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e5.name: Aegis of Zeonia
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e5.tooltip: Pantheon leaps at target enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning them for {{ e2 }} second. Pantheon also instantly refreshes his Aegis Protection.

5a13861b8bf55085c847d3fa.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.
5a13861b8bf55085c847d3fa.name: Tantrum
5a13861b8bf55085c847d3fa.tooltip:
Passive: Amumu takes {{ e1 }} reduced damage from physical attacks.

Active: Amumu deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding units. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.

5a13861a8bf55085c847d3eb.description: Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks.
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3eb.name: The Hextech Ultimatum
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3eb.tooltip:
Camille briefly becomes untargetable and leaps onto an enemy champion, interrupting channels and locking them into an area they cannot escape by any means for {{ e3 }} seconds. Other nearby enemies are knocked away. Her basic attacks against the trapped enemy deal bonus magic damage equal to {{ e2 }} plus {{ e1 }}% of their current health.

16

5a1386198bf55085c847d3d9.description: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.
5a1386198bf55085c847d3d9.name: Electro Harpoon
5a1386198bf55085c847d3d9.tooltip:
Rumble shoots his opponent with up to 2 tasers, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and applying a stacking slow of {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

Danger Zone Bonus: Damage and slow percentage increased by 50%.

5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e3.description: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e3.name: Riftwalk
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e3.tooltip:
Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemy units.

Each subsequent Riftwalk within the next {{ e2 }} seconds doubles the Mana cost and deals an additional {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f3 }}) magic damage per stack, stacking up to {{ e6 }} times.

5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e8.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e8.name: Ebb and Flow
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e8.tooltip:
Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions.

On Ally Hit: Heals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Health and will bounce to a nearby enemy champion.

On Enemy Hit: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and bounces to a nearby allied champion.

Bounces to each target only once, and hits up to {{ e2 }} targets. The damage and healing value is modified by ({{ f1 }}%) each bounce.

5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e2.description: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e2.name: Force Pulse
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e2.tooltip:
Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity, gaining a charge whenever a spell is cast near him.

Upon reaching 6 charges, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second in a cone in front of him.

5a1386178bf55085c847d3ca.description: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.
5a1386178bf55085c847d3ca.name: Wither
5a1386178bf55085c847d3ca.tooltip: Nasus ages target champion over {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%, increasing to {{ e1 }}% over the duration. The target's Attack Speed is reduced by half the amount.

5a13861b8bf55085c847d3f8.description: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
5a13861b8bf55085c847d3f8.name: Bandage Toss
5a13861b8bf55085c847d3f8.tooltip: Throws a bandage to target location. If it hits an enemy unit, Amumu will pull himself to the enemy, stun them for 1 second, and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

5a13861c8bf55085c847d400.description: Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor and Magic Resist boost for several seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.
5a13861c8bf55085c847d400.name: Quickdraw
5a13861c8bf55085c847d400.tooltip:
Dashes in a direction, reloading one shell. Graves gains True Grit for 4 seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead.

Basic attack hits lower the cooldown of Quickdraw by {{ e4 }} seconds. Damage against non-minions also refreshes True Grit.

True Grit grants {{ e5 }} Armor and Magic Resist (stacks up to {{ e0 }} times).

5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e1.description: Nunu commands the yeti to take a bite out of a target minion or monster, dealing heavy damage to it and healing himself.
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e1.name: Consume
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e1.tooltip:
Nunu commands the yeti to take a bite out of a minion or monster, dealing {{ e1 }} true damage and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}).

Passive - Feed The Yeti: For every Large or Epic Monster Consumed, Nunu gains increased Size, {{ e0 }}% Maximum Health, and {{ e9 }} out of combat Movement Speed for the next {{ f5 }} seconds (max {{ e6 }} stacks).

Recently Consumed monsters will not grant additional bonuses ({{ e5 }} second cooldown).

5a1386178bf55085c847d3c9.description: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.
5a1386178bf55085c847d3c9.name: Siphoning Strike
5a1386178bf55085c847d3c9.tooltip:
Nasus's next basic attack will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Siphoning Strike permanently gains {{ e2 }} damage if it kills an enemy. This bonus is doubled against Champions, large minions and large monsters.

5a1386188bf55085c847d3d4.description: Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location. His next attack deals bonus damage.
5a1386188bf55085c847d3d4.name: Deceive
5a1386188bf55085c847d3d4.tooltip:
Shaco teleports nearby and becomes Invisible for {{ e3 }} seconds. Shaco remains Invisible even if he uses Jack in the Box or Hallucinate.

His next basic attack during or shortly after Invisibility will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage ({{ f2 }} with Backstab) and reduce Deceive's cooldown by {{ f3 }} seconds.

16

5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e9.description: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e9.name: Tidal Wave
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e9.tooltip:
Summons a Tidal Wave from Nami's position. The wave knocks up enemies and slows them by {{ e4 }}%, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The duration of the slow increases based on how far the Tidal Wave has traveled, with a minimum duration of 2 seconds and a maximum of {{ e5 }} seconds.

Allies hit by the wave gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

5a1386188bf55085c847d3d1.description: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.
5a1386188bf55085c847d3d1.name: Golden Aegis
5a1386188bf55085c847d3d1.tooltip: Grants a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ e3 }} damage for each nearby enemy champion) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds, and slows surrounding enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e7.description: Pantheon composes himself then leaps into the air to a target, striking all enemy units in an area. Enemies closer to the impact point take more damage.
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e7.name: Grand Skyfall
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e7.tooltip:
Pantheon gathers his strength and then leaps high into the air, crashing down at target area a few seconds later. Deals up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies at the center (down to {{ e3 }}% at the edge) and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% for 1 second.

If Pantheon cancels this channel, Grand Skyfall is put on a {{ e5 }} second cooldown.

5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e6.description: Pantheon focuses and unleashes 3 swift strikes to the area in front of him dealing damage to all enemies. Pantheon also becomes more aware of his enemy's vital spots, allowing him to always crit enemies below 15% Health.
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e6.name: Heartseeker Strike
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e6.tooltip:
Passive: Pantheon's basic attacks and Spear Shot gain 100% critical strike chance against targets below {{ e3 }}% Health.

Active: Pantheon focuses and delivers {{ e4 }} swift strikes in front of him for a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage (deals {{ e2 }}% damage to minions and monsters).

Damage per Strike: {{ f1 }}

5a1386198bf55085c847d3d6.description:
Rengar slashes all enemies in an arc before piercing all enemies in a line. Casting this outside the max range moves Rengar a short distance in that direction.

Ferocity effect: deals increased damage.
5a1386198bf55085c847d3d6.name: Savagery
5a1386198bf55085c847d3d6.tooltip:
Slash all enemies in an arc before piercing all enemies in a line for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage per strike.

Ferocity effect:
Each hit deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage.

If cast outside max range, Rengar lunges forward to extend the range of the piercing attack.
If used during leap, Savagery is cast immediately following the leap.

5a1386378bf55085c847d423.description: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado.
5a1386378bf55085c847d423.name: Winds of War
5a1386378bf55085c847d423.tooltip:
Galio fires two windblasts that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

When the windblasts meet, they combine into a giant tornado that deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ charabilitypower2*3 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of enemies' maximum Health (max {{ e4 }} vs. monsters) as magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e4.description: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing damage.
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e4.name: Spear Shot
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3e4.tooltip: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

5a13861a8bf55085c847d3ea.description: Camille blasts in a cone after a delay, dealing damage. Enemies in the outer half are slowed and take extra damage, while also healing Camille.
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3ea.name: Tactical Sweep
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3ea.tooltip:
Camille winds up and then slices in a direction, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies hit.

Enemies hit by the outer half are slowed by {{ e4 }}%, decaying over {{ e2 }} seconds. They take extra physical damage equal to {{ e5 }}% (+{{ f2 }}%) of their maximum health, healing Camille for {{ e9 }}% of the bonus damage dealt (healing capped at {{ f3 }} from non-champions).

16

5a13861b8bf55085c847d3f5.description: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.
5a13861b8bf55085c847d3f5.name: Final Spark
5a13861b8bf55085c847d3f5.tooltip: Fires a dazzling ray of light dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in a line. Final Spark ignites and refreshes the Illumination debuff.
